name: Mommy Sensei: Horny Homework
description:
Life of the stinky kid isn't easy… Even the teachers are giving you grief! Don't give me that "lather, rinse, and repeat" nonsense, these pheromones can't be stopped with a simple shower. Believe me he's tried!

Life does a total 180 for Niito when he bumps into a woman who doesn't immediately recoil in disgust at his smell but even gives him a kiss on the cheek for being so helpful! The next thing he knows, the mysterious new woman is the Chairwoman of the university he is enrolled in. Talk about a visual novel level twist!

Shortly after Sayaka's sudden appearance, Niito gets wrapped up in a whirlwind as Sayaka comes up with schemes to help you unleash the potent powers of your pheromones to teach the teachers who made your life a living hell a lesson only found in the hardcore Miel school of revenge!

The targets: Niizaki Yuuka, the naughty nurse whose dynamite bod can't be hidden beneath a lab coat. Ooi Kiyomi, forget 'Kiyomi-chan is a girl!' this tomboy is an absolute MILF! Fuji Takako, she disguised her "disgust" of your man-musk with a facade of sweet and wholesomeness, so it will surely be satisfying to destroy that attitude as you dick her down hard! Last but not least, Shirashi Michiyo, looks like the quintessential strict professor types with devastating pencil skirt + pantyhose combo and a sheer white blouse barely holding back her bountiful bust...

That can't be all right? What about Sayaka herself? Well, she may be the chairwoman, but Sayak- aham, Mommy-sensei will be waiting for you to check off all the bullies before she gives you a special lesson of love!

On your quest for payback, make sure to keep an eye out on to find out the answers to important questions like: Who really is the mysterious Sayaka who appeared out of know where? And why were the teachers bullying you so bad in the first place?


  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • All the sexy senseis are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of riveting story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with character sprite animations
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • 20 scenes where full of content they never taught you in school!

Mommy Sensei: Horny Homework Is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

**PLEASE NOTE**
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.
